about_the_game:
Are you ready to fight against hordes of monsters? Choose your Hero and start a journey through the kingdoms of Entelos, defend the magic stone from the forces of the evil King of Darkness! Orcs, Lizardmen, Dark Elven, Undeads, Dark Knights, Demons and Dragons are searching you in this 3D fantasy hack and slash! Improve your character and your equipment, ride beasts and use magic spells in order to save Entelos from the destruction!
The Hero will start his journey with his weapon and shield, during the adventure she/he can change these by buying (with the gold collected when an enemy dies) or finding new swords, maces, axes, spears, staffs, bows and shields, she/he can use magic spells and ride beasts like horses, barghs, raptors and wyverns in order to defeat the enemies!
The game is set as a side scroller but you can change the point of view of the player's camera to obtain a totally free third person vision!
